name: AirCash
description:
It's ridiculous that we need centralized crypto exchanges.

Unfortunately, we cannot leave centralized crypto exchanges, because we need centralized exchanges for fiat cash in and out.

But AirCash aims to encrypt and decentralize the crypto Peer to Peer trading with smart contracts.

AirCash is the first and largest decentralized P2P  trading platform in the galaxy and it’s the best solution for fiat cash in and out. 

Let's buy and sell crypto with fiat money in a decentralized and anonymous way through AirCash.

AirCash-intro-video: https://youtu.be/AdtiEFKD1Fo

Link: https://linktr.ee/aircoin
